content:
Hello,
Do we have any public test server endpoint for uscore r4 profiles?

Note: I would like to use it for confirmance testing
Thanks
@Brett Marquard @Eric Haas

ONC provides one: https://fhir.sitenv.org/secure/
Also check testing platform: https://inferno.healthit.gov/reference-server/r4
oops https://inferno.healthit.gov/reference-server/r4 is a bad link try https://inferno.healthit.gov/community instead
The FHIR test servers also support the US Core Profiles if you specify the profile in meta.
https://inferno.healthit.gov/reference-server/r4 is the root endpoint. You cannot access it without token. https://inferno.healthit.gov/reference-server/r4/metadata is public accessible
Thank you so much for your response and details.
Note that for https://inferno.healthit.gov/reference-server/r4 you can set the following header to get access: Authorization: Bearer SAMPLE_ACCESS_TOKEN.cGF0aWVudC8qLio=
